title: Ticket #4776: Schedd does not log abnormal job termination in user log
description:
As reported on distcomp -

If the schedd and the startd have the same job lease duration (or the schedd's lease duration is slightly shorter), the startd may perform the ALIVE call to the schedd and get a "no known claim ID" error message in response. Correspondingly, the starter will kill the job - but nothing is logged in the user log.

This resulted in a user seeing two execute events in a row.

(we verified that increasing the lease duration fixed this, but I didn't verify the diagnosis above is correct).
